Cover Story


        
        The Slate Guide to Quarantine Summer
      

          Slate Staff
        
Fireworks and beach trips are overrated. Here’s how to update your old traditions for the very untraditional months ahead.

Cozy Mysteries! Epic Fantasies! No Viruses! A Reading List.
      

          Laura Miller

Your New Sports Obsessions
      

          Seth Maxon

The Sauce You Need to Have a “BBQ” Cookout Indoors
      

          J. Bryan Lowder
